entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to periods of rain in the morning then to a few flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
